idea-plugin.name: TODO++
idea-plugin.description:
Enhanced TODO Management for Developers

Take your TODO comments to the next level! TODO++ adds powerful features to manage, organize, and track TODOs across your entire project.

‚ú® Key Features:

  • Enhanced TODO Syntax - Assign TODOs to team members, set priorities, and categorize them
  • Smart Project Scanning - Automatically scans 15+ programming languages
  • Color-Coded Priorities - Visual distinction with RED (High), ORANGE (Medium), GREEN (Low)
  • Custom Priorities - Define your own priority levels and colors
  • Custom Tags - Add arbitrary metadata like 'risk:high', 'estimate:2d'
  • Due Dates - Track deadlines with 'due:YYYY-MM-DD' and see overdue alerts
  • Issue Integration - Link TODOs to GitHub/Jira issues and open them directly
  • Powerful Filtering - Filter by priority, assignee, category, or search by description
  • Quick Navigation - Double-click any TODO to jump straight to the code
  • Smart Alerts - See which TODOs need priority or assignee at a glance

üìù Supported Syntax:

// TODO(@assignee priority:level category:type): Description

üí° Examples:

// TODO(@john priority:high category:bug): Fix memory leak
// TODO(@sarah priority:medium category:feature): Add dark mode
// TODO(priority:low): Refactor this later
